entities.name: wands
entities.description: Wands are described as a desirable object that arouses passions in wizards. They are also mentioned to be immensely powerful and dangerous in the wrong hands.

entities.name: mr ollivander
entities.description: Mr. Ollivander is introduced as a character who has knowledge about wands and their history.

entities.name: gregorovitch
entities.description: Gregorovitch is mentioned to have the Elder Wand.

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: The Elder Wand is described as an object of incredible fascination and immense power.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is mentioned to be the one who had knowledge about Gregorovitch having the Elder Wand.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character who has knowledge about wands and their history. He also asks Mr. Ollivander questions about the Elder Wand.

relationships.description: Mr. Ollivander told You-Know-Who that Gregorovitch had the Elder Wand.
Harry asked Mr. Ollivander questions about the Elder Wand.
You-Know-Who had knowledge that Gregorovitch had the Elder Wand.
Harry knew that Gregorovitch had the Elder Wand.
